name: Hepcat
description: '''Hepcat''' is a ska and reggae band formed in southern [[California]] in 1989. Their soulful [[harmony|harmonies]] and mellow [[rhythm]]s were unlike those of contemporaries and more akin to musicians from the heyday of 1960s [[Jamaica]]n [[ska]] (also referred to as the first wave) with elements of [[soul music|soul]], [[jazz]] and [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]].
